question: Which among the following was the first conglomeration of the scattered princely states , which later became modern Rajasthan after several more mergers?
explanation: The United States of Matsya was a State of India which was formed on 17 March 1948. Shobha Ram Kumawat was the first and last chief minister of the State. In the year 1949, the Matsya Union was merged with Rajasthan.
